meanings.definition: A decorative technique in which fabric is gathered and stitched together in a pattern of small openings.
meanings.sent1: The dress had beautiful fagoting along the hem, creating delicate patterns.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to do fagoting to embellish her handmade curtains.
meanings.sent3: The fagoting on the pillowcase made it look like a fancy lace doily.
meanings.sent4: Her skilled fagoting turned the plain fabric into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate fagoting on the tablecloth caught everyone's eye at the party.

meanings.definition: To create a decorative pattern in fabric using the fagoting technique.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys fagoting different designs on her sewing projects.
meanings.sent2: They fagoted the edges of the tablecloth for a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: He fagoted a heart shape on the fabric as a surprise for his mom.
meanings.sent4: Fagoting the borders of the quilt added a special charm to it.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress fagoted the sleeves of the dress with precision.
